settings.question: Is my personal information secure?
settings.answer: Yes, we take the security of your personal information seriously. Our website is equipped with SSL encryption to ensure that your data is protected during transmission. We also adhere to strict privacy policies to safeguard your information.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this tracking number to monitor the status and location of your package. Alternatively, you can log in to your account on our website to track your order in real-time.

settings.question: Do you offer discounts or promotions?
settings.answer: Yes, we occasionally run promotions and offer discounts on select products. Sign up for our newsletter or follow us on social media to stay updated on the latest deals and offers.

settings.question: Can I return or exchange an item?
settings.answer: Yes, we have a hassle-free return and exchange policy. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the item within 30 days for a full refund or exchange. Please refer to our Returns & Exchanges page for more details.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Shipping times vary depending on your location and the products ordered. Typically, orders are processed within 1-2 business days, and shipping can take between 3-7 business days for domestic orders. International shipping may take longer.

settings.question: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept payments via major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and other secure payment gateways.
